item.title: Charan Sai K
item.description:
I’m a goal-oriented software engineer with 6 years of experience in building and maintaining software. I pride myself on being a problem solver, always striving to find the most efficient solutions. I am highly skilled in communication, collaboration, and generating technical documentation, ensuring smooth workflows and clear project guidelines. My efforts are focused on amplifying the capabilities and productivity of the entire team.

Work Experience

Software Engineer

Cisco | Nov 2023 - Present

item.title: Work History
item.description:
